events.title: Platform kickoff
events.description: Started building core SaaS platform — dashboard, onboarding, page editor, pipeline board across 85 sessions

events.title: MCP tools & agent infrastructure
events.description: Built and debugged MCP tools, agent engine, streaming endpoints, and agent architecture

events.title: First major integrations
events.description: Calendar connector (1,352 lines, 12 files), OAuth setup, database migrations

events.title: Planning paralysis discovered
events.description: Claude spent entire sessions exploring code without producing any changes — a pattern that would recur

events.title: Payment integration
events.description: Full payment infrastructure — production config, deploy bug fixes, cost optimization

events.title: Overnight autonomous builds
events.description: 'Build a surprising SaaS feature overnight' — woke up to 2,123 lines of working code

events.title: Client demos shipped
events.description: Demo with chat handoffs, transfer analytics, custom theming

events.title: Ghost migration incident
events.description: Critical bug fix appeared complete but migration was ghost-applied — never actually executed

events.title: Parallel sub-agent architecture audit
events.description: Dispatched 8 sub-agents for security, performance, TypeScript, and architecture reviews simultaneously

events.title: Dark editorial theming
events.description: 13+ file theme migration to match modern dark aesthetic site-wide

events.title: Marketing site & video production
events.description: Features pages, OG images, animated explainers, dev blog

events.title: Deployment pipeline refined
events.description: Resolved recurring CLI issues, env var trailing newlines, branch management

events.title: Context window overflow
events.description: 11+ parallel sub-agents overwhelmed context — every response truncated

events.title: Bug-fix-to-PR pipeline mastered
events.description: QA report → implement → review → fix findings → push PR, sometimes in under 10 minutes

events.title: This dev log built
events.description: Static blog generated from Claude Code /insights data — what you're reading now

events.title: 256 commits shipped
events.description: 180 sessions, 5 project areas, ~2 months of building with Claude Code

events.title: Key insight crystallized
events.description: High-trust delegation with decisive course-correction beats careful upfront specification

events.title: Patterns documented
events.description: Friction points, power user tips, and future workflows captured for others to learn from
